AT.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
AT.description: Begib dich zurück zu den Anfängen von Marios Karriere, als der tapfere Klempner es zum ersten Mal im Alleingang mit dem mächtigen Donkey Kong aufnahm! Rette Pauline aus DKs Pranken, indem du auf Plattformen springst sowie fallenden Fässern und verheerenden Feuerbällen ausweichst, um das obere Ende jedes Levels zu erreichen. Mit dem in der NES™-Version nicht enthaltenen Zementfabrik-Level und einigen weiteren kleinen Ergänzungen ist dies die endgültige Version des Arcade-Klassikers für zu Hause.

CH.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
CH.description: Begib dich zurück zu den Anfängen von Marios Karriere, als der tapfere Klempner es zum ersten Mal im Alleingang mit dem mächtigen Donkey Kong aufnahm! Rette Pauline aus DKs Pranken, indem du auf Plattformen springst sowie fallenden Fässern und verheerenden Feuerbällen ausweichst, um das obere Ende jedes Levels zu erreichen. Mit dem in der NES™-Version nicht enthaltenen Zementfabrik-Level und einigen weiteren kleinen Ergänzungen ist dies die endgültige Version des Arcade-Klassikers für zu Hause.

BG.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
BG.description: Journey back to the beginning of Mario's career, when the plucky plumber single-handedly took on the mighty Donkey Kong for the very first time! Save Pauline from DK's clutches by negotiating platforms, dodging bouncing barrels and deadly fireballs, to reach the top of each stage. This authentic version of the arcade classic reinstates the cement factory level that was not included in the original NES™ release, plus some additional touches that make this the definitive home version!

BE.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
BE.description: Redécouvrez les débuts de carrière de Mario, à l'époque où le courageux plombier bravait seul les dangers pour affronter l'imposant Donkey Kong ! Sauvez Pauline des griffes du singe et évitez tonneaux et boules de feu, tout en vous déplaçant de plateforme en plateforme, jusqu'en haut de chaque stage ! Cette version fidèle au jeu d'arcade classique comprend le stage « Usine » qui n'était pas présent sur NES™, ainsi que d'autres ajouts. Vous avez là, la version ultime du jeu !

CY.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
CY.description: Journey back to the beginning of Mario's career, when the plucky plumber single-handedly took on the mighty Donkey Kong for the very first time! Save Pauline from DK's clutches by negotiating platforms, dodging bouncing barrels and deadly fireballs, to reach the top of each stage. This authentic version of the arcade classic reinstates the cement factory level that was not included in the original NES™ release, plus some additional touches that make this the definitive home version!

ES.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
ES.description: ¡Regresa con Mario a los orígenes de su carrera, cuando el intrépido fontanero se enfrentó por primera vez al poderoso Donkey Kong! Rescata a Pauline de las garras de Donkey Kong, moviéndote entre plataformas y sorteando barriles rodantes y peligrosísimas bolas de fuego, para avanzar hasta el siguiente nivel. Esta versión del clásico de arcade reincorpora el nivel de la fábrica de cemento, no incluido en el lanzamiento original para la consola NES™, así como nuevos detalles que hacen de esta la versión definitiva del juego.

IT.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
IT.description: Tuffati in un viaggio nel tempo e torna nel passato, rivivendo una delle primissime avventure di Mario, in cui il coraggioso idraulico affronta per la prima volta il potente Donkey Kong! Salva Pauline dalle grinfie di Donkey Kong spostandoti da una piattaforma all'altra, schivando barili e fiamme per raggiungere la parte superiore di ogni livello. Questa versione originale del classico arcade include il livello della fabbrica di cemento, non compreso nell'originale NES™, e presenta ulteriori elementi che la rendono perfetta per giocare da casa!

AU.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
AU.description: Journey back to the beginning of Mario's career, when the plucky plumber single-handedly took on the mighty Donkey Kong for the very first time! NZ.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
NZ.description: Journey back to the beginning of Mario's career, when the plucky plumber single-handedly took on the mighty Donkey Kong for the very first time! Save Pauline from DK's clutches by negotiating platforms, dodging bouncing barrels and deadly fireballs, to reach the top of each stage. This authentic version of the arcade classic reinstates the cement factory level that was not included in the original NES™ release, plus some additional touches that make this the definitive home version!

PT.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
PT.description: Faz uma viagem no tempo até ao início da carreira de Mario, quando o destemido canalizador enfrentou sozinho e pela primeira vez o poderoso Donkey Kong! Salva Pauline das garras de DK, transpondo plataformas, evitando barris e bolas de fogo mortíferas, de modo a chegares ao topo de cada nível. Esta versão autêntica do clássico das arcadas restitui o nível da fábrica de cimento que não estava incluído no lançamento original para a NES™, bem como retoques adicionais que tornam este jogo ideal para jogar em casa!

NL.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
NL.description: Reis terug in de tijd naar het begin van Mario's carrière, toen de besnorde loodgieter het voor het eerst opnam tegen de machtige Donkey Kong! Bevrijd Pauline uit de greep van DK door het bovenste gedeelte van het level te bereiken terwijl je plateaus bedwingt en tonnen en vuurballen ontwijkt. Deze authentieke versie van de speelhalknaller herstelt het cement factory-level, dat niet beschikbaar was in de originele NES™-versie, in ere. Verdere aanvullende content maakt dit tot de ultieme versie voor thuis.

SI.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
SI.description: Journey back to the beginning of Mario's career, when the plucky plumber single-handedly took on the mighty Donkey Kong for the very first time! Save Pauline from DK's clutches by negotiating platforms, dodging bouncing barrels and deadly fireballs, to reach the top of each stage. This authentic version of the arcade classic reinstates the cement factory level that was not included in the original NES™ release, plus some additional touches that make this the definitive home version!

RU.name: Donkey Kong™ Original Edition
RU.description: Эта игра перенесет вас в те далекие незапамятные времена, когда юный водопроводчик Марио впервые взял верх над Донки Конгом в неравном поединке! Спасите Pauline из лап злодея! Уворачивайтесь от катящихся бочек и огненных шаров, преодолевайте несметное количество препятствий, перепрыгивая с платформы на платформу на пути к заветной цели! Donkey Kong Original Edition содержит уровень «Цементная фабрика», которого не было в первой версии игры для NES™. Эта игра порадует вас множеством необычных нюансов и станет жемчужиной вашей домашней игротеки!
